mapper.select: select w.order_id, pp.plan_id, ppi.prd_id, m.item_name, w.plan_qty, w.plan_start_date as start_date, w.plan_end_date as end_date, w.status, w.created_date, w.remark from work_order w join production_plan pp on w.plan_id = pp.plan_id join production_plan_item ppi on w.plan_id = ppi.plan_id join product_mst m on w.prd_id = m.prd_id order by w.order_id desc
